properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , STATUS FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'A'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' AND N.TO_WHOM = 'U' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_NO , TO_WHOM ) VALUES ( SEQ_NONO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 'U' )
